meta.description: A collection of my mods for the game Balatro.

ror.title: Risk of Jesters - DVRP's Balatro Mods
ror.description: Adds a bunch of Risk-of-Rain-themed Jokers, Vouchers, and Blinds.
ror.name: Risk of Jesters
ror.intro: New Jokers, Vouchers, and Blinds themed with the Risk of Rain franchise make their entrance, yet still retaining the feeling of vanilla Balatro. The volume is not that big yet, but you can expect more to come as new DLC for Risk of Rain 2 is approaching...
ror.install-2: Download the mod and unzip it.
ror.install-3: Put <xin><c>RiskofJesters</></> folder into <xin><c>C:\Users\(USER)\AppData\Roaming\Balatro\Mods</></>. Create the <xin><c>Mods</></> folder if it doesn't exist.

languages.description: Following languages are supported for now.

ror.contents: Current version has {jokers} Jokers, {vouchers} Vouchers, and {blinds} Blinds. You can check the full list below.

changelog.0-1-1: Now properly displays Steamodded mod badge, added Russian translation done by <xin><c>@НЕШКО</></>, fixed incorrect collection page ordering of some Jokers, and changed Eulogy Zero's ability to have 1 in 2 chance.
changelog.0-1-2: Fixed imcompatibility with other modded Jokers.

bungus.name: Bustling Fungus
bungus.description:
After 5 rounds, add Foil to base edition Jokers on both sides
(Currently 0/5)

snake_eyes.name: Snake Eyes
snake_eyes.description:
Gains +6 Mult if The Wheel of Fortune fails
(Currently +2 Mult)

daisy.name: Lepton Daisy
daisy.description: <chip>+50</> Chips for each <at>debuffed</> card in played hand

kjaro.name: Kjaro's Band
kjaro.description: <xmult>X4</> Mult if Chips scored in last round were more than <at>X4</> of required Chips

duplicator.name: Substandard Duplicator
duplicator.description:
When gain a Joker, create a Negative Temporary copy of it
Temporary : Gets destroyed at end of round and has no sell value

happiest.name: Happiest Mask
happiest.description:
1 in 2 chance to create a random Spectral card when any card is destroyed
(Must have room)

benthic.name: Benthic Bloom
benthic.description: Upgrade <at>1</> random <at>Joker</> into <at>Joker</> of the next <at>higher rarity</> when <at>Boss Blind</> is defeated

encrusted.name: Encrusted Key
encrusted.description: After defeating the <at>Boss Blind</>, this card is destroyed and gain a <at>Coupon Tag</>

egocentrism.name: Egocentrism
egocentrism.description:
+40 Chips for each Egocentrism. Convert a random Joker into Egocentrism when Blind is selected
(Currently +40 Chips)

eulogy.name: Eulogy Zero
eulogy.description: <at>Shop</> cards have <gr>1 in 2</> chance of being <at>half price</> and <at>flipped</>

mili.name: Mili-Tech Printer
mili.description: Can choose <at>1</> more card from all <at>Booster Packs</>

loop.name: The Loop
loop.description: Random Joker disabled after playing 2 hands

void.name: The Void
void.description: Set all Jokers' sell value to 0 when defeated

hammer.name: Glaucous Hammer
hammer.description: Start with random half of the deck debuffed

crab.name: Tyrian Crab
crab.description: X1.5 required Chips after each hand played

kor.title: 옳은 한글 - 발라트로 모드를 만듭니다
kor.description: 엉망진창인 한국어 번역을 수정하고 번역되지 않은 부분, 읽기에 부자연스러운 부분을 올바르게 고칩니다.
kor.name: 옳은 한글
kor.intro: 조커부터 바우처, 태그, UI, 튜토리얼, 짐보의 대사와 크레딧까지 모두 올바른 한국어 번역으로 수정합니다. 부스터 팩의 장수 표시, 허용되지 않은 핸드를 플레이했을 때의 경고 알림, 바우처 재입고 문구 등 번역되지 않았거나 한국어 화자가 읽기에 부자연스러운 부분까지 고쳐 한국인 유저의 게임플레이를 개선합니다.
kor.install-comment-1: Steamodded를 이용해 설치하는 v0.4.0 이전 버전에서 업데이트하는 경우에도 아래 방법을 따라가면 됩니다. 다만 기존 ProperKorean 폴더는 지우고 새로 받아야 합니다.
kor.install-comment-2: <xin><c>v0.4.0</></> 버전으로 업데이트했고 다른 모드가 설치되어 있지 않다면 Steamodded는 삭제해도 괜찮습니다. 이미 적용된 Steamodded를 적용 해제하려면 <xin><c>Balatro.exe</></>를 삭제하고 Steam의 발라트로 설정에서 게임 파일 무결성 검사를 진행해 순정 상태의 게임 파일을 받으면 됩니다.
kor.install-1: Lovely를 설치합니다. 링크를 눌러 나오는 페이지에서 최신 버전의 version.dll를 다운로드하세요.
kor.install-2: 아래 사진과 같이 발라트로가 설치된 폴더를 열고 다운로드받은 <xin><c>version.dll</></>을 그곳으로 옮깁니다.
kor.install-3: <xin>윈도우 키 + <c>R</></>을 눌러 실행 창을 열고 사진과 같이 입력합니다. 열린 경로에 <xin><c>Mods</></> 폴더가 없다면 만들어 주세요.
kor.install-6: 발라트로를 실행했을 때 검은색 콘솔이 함께 실행되면 모드가 정상적으로 설치된 것입니다.
kor.changes-2: 올바르지 않은 텍스트 서식 및 오기재된 능력치 수정
kor.changes-7: 기존 한국어 폰트와 영어 폰트를 합쳐 기존 발라트로의 느낌 유지

changelog.0-2-0: 잘못 번역됐던 부분들 수정, 일부 개행을 더 읽기 쉽도록 변경, 잔인함 도전에서 미번역된 부분과 <xin><c>Not Allowed!</></> 문구 번역, 코드 정리 및 리팩토링
changelog.0-3-0: 궤도 태그 사용 시 족보 이름이 번역되지 않은 상태로 나타나던 문제 수정, 투명 조커의 네거티브 관련 설명을 더욱 명확하게 개선, 블라인드 컬렉션에서 단어 배치 순서를 자연스럽게 변경, 오인하는 상황을 방지하기 위해 <xin>바우처 교환됨</>을 <xin>바우처 사용됨</>으로 변경, 상황에 따라 알맞은 조사가 사용되도록 하는 코드 추가, 크레딧 번역
changelog.0-3-22: 우상을 잠금 해제했지만 발견하지는 않았을 때 컬렉션에서 마우스를 올리면 크래시가 발생하는 오류 수정
changelog.0-4-0: 패치 방식을 Steamodded에서 Lovely로 전환, 미번역된 바우처 재입고 문구 번역
changelog.0-5-0: 1.0.1f 대응, 일부 조커의 능력이 발동되는 시점을 더욱 명확하게 알 수 있도록 설명 수정 (남작, 고대 조커 등), 일부 설명을 더욱 간결하게 개선

reverie.title: Reverie - DVRP's Balatro Mods
reverie.description: A movie-themed expansion that focuses on providing special shops and various contents around it.
reverie.name: Reverie
reverie.intro-1: Ever had a dream where all shop cards become Negative? Or a dream that shop becomes complete gacha and RNG? They are all here, just prepare your tickets!
reverie.intro-2: Reverie is a movie-themed Balatro expansion that focuses on providing special shops and various contents around it.
reverie.install-1: Install Steamodded (0.9.8 or higher) and Lovely (v0.5.0-beta2 or higher).
reverie.install-2: Download the mod and unzip it.
reverie.install-3: Put <xin><c>Reverie</></> folder into <xin><c>C:\Users\(USER)\AppData\Roaming\Balatro\Mods</></>. Create the <xin><c>Mods</></> folder if it doesn't exist.

languages.description: Following languages are supported for now.

reverie.contents: Current version has <cine>{cines} Cines</>, <at>{jokers} Jokers</>, <at>{backs} Decks</>, <at>{boosters} Booster Packs</>, and <at>{tags} Tags</>.

changelog.1-0-1: 🔧 Fixed a bug where completing Exchange Coupon may crashed the game|🔧 Fixed a bug where Cine slot doesn't get affected by screenshake|🔧 Fixed some minor wording
changelog.1-0-2: 🔧 Added compatibility with DX Boosters|🔧 Fixed a bug where Filmstrip Deck doesn't give additional Cine slot|🔧 Fixed imcompatibility with other modded Jokers
changelog.1-1-0: ✨ Added a new Spectral card: Reverie|✨ Added new Booster Packs: Jumbo Film Pack, Mega Film Pack|🔼 Changed requirements for Poker Face Exchange Coupon: enhancing 10 cards → 8 cards|🔄 Changed requirements for Eerie Inn Exchange Coupon: now requires destroying 5 cards|🔼 Changed Eerie Inn: now only Spectral Packs appear|🔽 Changed requirements for Tag or Die Exchange Coupon: skipping 3 Blinds → 4 Blinds|🔽 Changed Tag or Die: Tags cost $7 → $8|🔼 Now using Cine cards will restock all Booster Packs|🔧 Added compatibility with Gacha Deck from Gimmicky Decks Pack|🔧 Improved compatibility with DX Tarots|🔧 Improved descriptions to be more clear|🔧 Fixed interation between purchased Tags and Double Tag|🔧 Fixed a bug where viewing deck or opening collection progressed Poker Face Exchange Coupon|🔧 Fixed a bug where Crazy Lucky didn't properly stacked with Let It Moon/Eerie Inn/Tag or Die|🔧 Fixed a bug where opening modded Booster Packs didn't progressed Crazy Lucky Exchange Coupon|🔧 Fixed a bug where progress of Tag or Die Exchange Coupon didn't get saved|🔧 Fixed a bug where selling Editioned consumables progressed Gem Heist Exchange Coupon|🔧 Fixed a bug where completing Exchange Coupons can make Cine cards debuffed|🔧 Fixed a bug where after using I Sing, I've No Shape the game could crash in rare cases

reverie.cines-1: <cine>Cine</> cards are new type of consumables that can temporarily spice up your shop. To get them, you first need to earn <cine>Exchange Coupons</> from Booster Packs or Tags.
reverie.cines-2: They are some sort of quests that will turn into Cine card once you complete the requirements. In rare cases, you can get Cine card directly without going through quests.
reverie.cines-3: Cine cards have their own dedicated card area, <cine>Cine slot</>, separate from consumable slot.
reverie.cines-4: Using two or more Cine cards in one shop will replace each other, unless you are playing with <cine>Filmstrip Deck</>. Combining Cine cards is very satisfying and powerful, so try out many different combos!

gem-heist.name: Gem Heist
gem-heist.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Gem Heist after selling 2 Editioned Jokers
(Currently 0/2)

Gem Heist
During this shop, all cards become Polychrome and 25% off
Rerolls cards

tag-or-die.name: Tag or Die
tag-or-die.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Tag or Die after skipping 4 Blinds
(Currently 0/4)

Tag or Die
During this shop, only Tags that cost $8 appear
Rerolls Booster Packs

eerie-inn.name: Eerie Inn
eerie-inn.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Eerie Inn after destroying 5 cards
(Currently 0/5)

Eerie Inn
During this shop, only Spectral Packs appear
Rerolls Booster Packs

let-it-moon.name: Let It Moon
let-it-moon.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Let It Moon after using 10 Planet or Tarot cards
(Currently 0/10)

Let It Moon
During this shop, only Planet and Tarot cards appear
Rerolls Booster Packs

poker-face.name: Poker Face
poker-face.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Poker Face after enhancing 8 Playing cards
(Currently 0/8)

Poker Face
During this shop, only Playing cards from your deck appear
Rerolls Booster Packs

crazy-lucky.name: Crazy Lucky
crazy-lucky.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Crazy Lucky after opening 6 Booster Packs
(Currently 0/6)

Crazy Lucky
During this shop, everything becomes Pack
Rerolls Booster Packs

adrifting.name: Adrifting
adrifting.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Adrifting after playing 5 debuffed or faced down cards
(Currently 0/5)

Adrifting
During this shop, everything is faced down and costs $1
Rerolls cards and Booster Packs

morsel.name: Morsel
morsel.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Morsel after getting 2 Food Jokers
(Currently 0/2)

Morsel
During this shop, only Food Jokers with doubled ability values appear
Rerolls Booster Packs

unseen.name: The Unseen
unseen.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to The Unseen after having 1 empty Joker slot for 5 rounds
(Currently 0/5)

The Unseen
During this shop, all Jokers and consumables become Negative
X5 reroll cost
Rerolls cards

ive-no-shape.name: I Sing, I've No Shape
ive-no-shape.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to I Sing, I've No Shape after scoring more than X2 of required Chips in 2 Blinds
(Currently 0/2)

I Sing, I've No Shape
During this shop, only owned Jokers appear
X3 reroll cost
Rerolls Booster Packs

reverie.name: Reverie
reverie.description: Applies every <cine>Cine cards</> to this shop

tag-pack-normal.name: Tag Pack
tag-pack-normal.description:
Choose 1 of up to 2 Tags
(Only appears with Tag or Die)

tag-pack-jumbo.name: Jumbo Tag Pack
tag-pack-jumbo.description:
Choose 1 of up to 4 Tags
(Only appears with Tag or Die)

tag-pack-mega.name: Mega Tag Pack
tag-pack-mega.description:
Choose 2 of up to 4 Tags
(Only appears with Tag or Die)

film-pack-normal.name: Film Pack
film-pack-normal.description: Choose <at>1</> of up to <at>2</> <cine>Exchange Coupons</> to add to your possesion

film-pack-jumbo.name: Jumbo Film Pack
film-pack-jumbo.description: Choose <at>1</> of up to <at>4</> <cine>Exchange Coupons</> to add to your possesion

film-pack-mega.name: Film Pack
film-pack-mega.description: Choose <at>1</> of up to <at>2</> <cine>Cine</> cards to add to your possesion

pack-normal.name: Pack
pack-normal.description:
Choose 1 of up to 4 anything to add to your possesion
(Only appears with Crazy Lucky)

stamp-tag.name: Stamp Tag
stamp-tag.description:
Gives a free Jumbo Tag Pack
(Only appears with Stamp Deck)

dynamic-film.name: Dynamic Film
dynamic-film.description:
This Joker gains +15 Chips every time an Exchange Coupon is progressing
(Currently +0 Chips)
